QuestData.Title: Mending a Broken Hart
QuestData.Description:
We have all the reagents for the counter-curse!
Hurry up and cast it before Qadarin's soul is lost, and Thiernax refuses to help you, and Tyrande is doomed to die horribly in the Maw, and everyone is sad!
But no pressure.
QuestData.RewardText:
Were it not for your aid, Qadarin's soul would have been lost forever.
I... I can do no less than offer my aid in return.
